name: Pictures at an Exhibition
description:
we invite you to an exhibition

of emotions
of states
of minds
of consciousness and being

we invite you

to look at our vision
to listen to our imprints

to stare at our gaze

we invite you to something that does not exist

and yet is real and tangible

--

If you have any questions or comments, feel free to contact @secr3t5 on twitter.
